full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BSKAL BZANG RNAM 'DREN STONG GI SKU BRNYAN SPAR SHIN TU MDZES BSKRUN SKABS ZUNG LDAN GYI SNYAN NGAG BSNGAGS BRJOD DBYANGS SU SGROGS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002A *, ,(CES ZUNG LDAN GYI SNYAN NGAG BSNGAGS BRJOD DBYANGS SU SGROGS PA 'DI NI DGE BSHES NGAG DBANG DON GRUB THO YON NGAG DBANG TSUL KHRIMS THO MON 'CHI MED BSTAN PA SOGS KYIS RKYEN DANG DO DAM BYAS NAS, ,ZLA MED LHA BZOD PAR PO THOS BSAM GLING PA DGE TSUL NGAG DBANG GRAGS PA DANG, ,DON GRUB GLING PA CI'I PI SHVA KARMA NGAG DBANG BZID PA OAN KHAMS TSAN PA BZO RIG THOGS MED DU 'PHRUL BYED DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSO GSUM GYIS BSKAL BZANG RNAM 'DREN STONG GI SKU BRNYAN GYI SPAR SHIN TU MDZES BSKRUN SKABS, ,^ SNYAN DAG MKHAN KUN TU DGE BA'I BLO GROS SAM MING GZHAN PA tU SIDDHIS MGRIN PA'I RDZA [???] SOR MO'I SGYU RTZAS KYIS BRDUB PA'I SGRA DBYANGS THOGS MED 'BYUNG BA'O,, ,,)
